meanings.definition: A boat race or series of boat races.
meanings.sent1: The annual regatta on the lake was a thrilling event.
meanings.sent2: Many people gathered to watch the regatta on the river.
meanings.sent3: The ducks decided to have a regatta to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The regatta of colorful sailboats painted a beautiful picture on the water.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the starting horn marked the beginning of the regatta.

meanings.definition: An organized series of races or other competitions.
meanings.sent1: The school organized a regatta for the students to participate in.
meanings.sent2: Participants from different countries joined the international regatta.
meanings.sent3: The regatta of squirrels racing to find acorns was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The regatta of spelling bees determined the champion of the school.
meanings.sent5: The regatta of cars in the race was a sight to behold.
